type.name: org.gradle.api.tasks.testing.TestReport
type.description: Generates an HTML test report from the results of one or more Test tasks.

method.name: getDestinationDir
method.description: Returns the directory to write the HTML report to.

method.name: getTestResultDirs
method.description: Returns the set of binary test results to include in the report.

method.name: reportOn
method.description:
Adds some results to include in the report.

This method accepts any parameter of the given types:

  • A Test task instance. The results from the test task are included in the report. The test task is automatically added as a dependency of this task.
  • Anything that can be converted to a set of File instances as per org.gradle.api.Project#files(Object...). These must point to the binary test results directory generated by a Test task instance.
  • An Iterable. The contents of the iterable are converted recursively.

param:results The result objects.

method.name: setDestinationDir
method.description: Sets the directory to write the HTML report to.

method.name: setTestResultDirs
method.description: Sets the binary test results to use to include in the report. Each entry must point to a binary test results directory generated by a Test task.

property.name: destinationDir
property.description: Returns the directory to write the HTML report to.

property.name: testResultDirs
property.description: Returns the set of binary test results to include in the report.
